title: Emery calls for Villa to be ´protagonists´ against PSG as he targets sustained European success
description: Unai Emery wants Aston Villa to be “protagonists” when they face Paris Saint-Germain in the first leg of their Champions League quarter-final on Wednesday. The Spaniard is gearing up for a “special and spectacular” return to Parc des Princes, where he spent two seasons in charge of PSG between 2016 and 2018. He does so […] The post Emery calls for Villa to be ´protagonists´ against PSG as he targets sustained European success appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Amorim accepts Neville´s ´robotic´ criticism but insists Man Utd are progressing
description: Manchester United coach Ruben Amorim believes Gary Neville’s comments on the robotic nature of his side are “quite fair”, but he was quick to defend their approach. Neville’s suggestion that United were micromanaged too heavily came after an uninspired 0-0 draw in the Manchester derby last weekend. United toiled in that game against a below-par […] The post Amorim accepts Neville´s ´robotic´ criticism but insists Man Utd are progressing appeared first on Soccer News.
